data.title: Why Play Online ludo on vpl?

description: Ludo, a classic board game with centuries of tradition behind it has found its way to online platforms with the advent of technology. From playing with friends and family at home to competing with thousands of players on a smartphone, Ludo has undergone a massive evolution with time. While both facets of the game offer different experiences, at its core, both remain the same, with sets of rules that are applicable to both.
The popularity of ludo as an online strategic card game has grown exponentially in recent years. In India, online ludo is quickly becoming a go-to for players looking to enjoy a quick card game.

components.name: H2header
components.id: Basic Rules to Play Ludo on vpl

data.header: Basic Rules to Play Ludo on vpl

description: Take a look at the top online Ludo rules every player must know to enjoy the game to the fullest:

Deals ludo is essentially a game of Points ludo that is played for a fixed number of deals or rounds. Amongst the different types of ludo, this is a ludo variation where every player gets an equal number of scores at the start of every deal. When the pre-determined deals are over, the player with the maximum scores is declared as the winner. In deals ludo, players pay a fixed entry fee to join the table. The entry fee of all players is used to form the prize pool.

Similar to Deals ludo, players in a table pool-in money to start the game, which forms the prize pool. Much like other different types of ludo, Pools ludo is also played over a number of rounds. However, in this ludo variation, the game is played with a pre-decided points tally. The player to reach the points tally gets eliminated. This continues until only one player is left on the table, who is declared as the winner. It is popularly played in two versions - 101 and 201 Pool ludo

content:
Pool ludo Strategies For Beginners

Scoring the least possible points at the end of every game is the key to avoid elimination. Strategic discarding of cards is important in Pool ludo. It is advisable to lose the high value cards like K, Q, A and J. This helps to lower the overall score in case the player fails to win the round.

description: Apart from the variations in ludo, interested players can also participate in various online ludo leaderboards available on the vpl app. Players are pitted against multiple players for intense competitive online ludo games with those having better skills usually winning the game.
